PROFESSIONAL

Possesses excellent planning and problem-solving skills, accustomed to operating under considerable pressure, Passionate about quality and enthusiasm for technology.

No comercial from Jan 2018

Working knowledge of HTML/HTML5, CSS/CSS3, JavaScript ES6+, jQuery, GIT, Responsive Web Developer, Understand Agile, Scrum, Program to coding: Visual Studio Code, Problem solving skills, Analytical skills, Imaginative and creative, Attention to detail, Good verbal and written communication skills, reading English documentation, level B2, Keen to progress personal development and training

Electronic Engineer

HCD Ltd. in UK

Building around 100 Prototype’s PCB, Making sure program is working correctly direct in the machine, Optimize whole process, Using methodology 5s, Kaizen, Building Packages all types of components, Being involved in meetings to help customers get product on time and best as possible, Possess a lot of skills in that time like team work, reading english documentation, teaching & problem-solving skills. Experienced with Xray XD6500 XIDAT, Working on machines: Europlacer IINEO, Speedprint SP200AVI, Oven Air Solder A70-j82S, AOI Mirtec MV-7 Omni.

SMT Operator

Jaltek System in UK

Setting, operating automatic pick and place machines, troubleshooting program/process/ machine issues and fault corrections on Europlacer IINEO, VITESSE, FINESSE, verifying programs for machines and reflow profiles for extensive range of electronic assemblies, operating automatic solder paste printers, wave soldering, screen printing programming on Speedprint SP200AVI Experienced with AOI Mirtec MV-3L Experienced with Xray XD6500 XIDAT, Rework/rebuild surface mount component on PCB’s, Experienced with PDR - BGA
